changeFastbridge(address).details: Changes the fastBridge, useful to increase the claim deposit.

params._fastBridgeSender: The address of the new fastBridge.

relayCreateDispute(uint256,bytes32,uint2.details: Provide the same parameters as on the originalChain while creating a dispute. Providing incorrect parameters will create a different hash than on the originalChain and will not affect the actual dispute/arbitrable's ruling.

rule(uint256,uint256).details: Give a ruling for a dispute. Must be called by the arbitrator. The purpose of this function is to ensure that the address calling it has the right to rule on the contract.

params._disputeID: ID of the dispute in the Arbitrator contract.
params._ruling: Ruling given by the arbitrator. Note that 0 is reserved for "Not able/wanting to make a decision".
